title: Does ip boosts stack ?
body: So i am buying a riot card for 10$ to buy a 3 day ip boost. Do they stack ? If they dont i will just buy a skin. Thanks riot or people for responding.

replies.body: It's possible to obtain an IP per win and also day boost at the same time.  These IP boosts do stack!  We're also starting the [IP Bonus Weekend](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you), so it's going to start raining IP for you!  I hope that helps clear things up, and best of luck out there.  :D

Thank you for your reply. Yes i don't mean to be greedy, but i wanted to unlock runes, and the 1350 / 450 champions this weekend. I am a fairly new account player, so i like ip. I play aram casually but i might get into rank. I am grateful Porocles for your response, and i appreciate your hard work for me and others.

Thank you for the reply, take care and best wishes friend.
